verses.name: Romans 12:18
verses.text: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.

verses.name: Romans 12:19
verses.text: Dearly beloved, avenge not yourselves, but rather give place unto wrath: for it is written, Vengeance is mine; I will repay, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Romans 12:20
verses.text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger, feed him; if he thirst, give him drink: for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head.

verses.name: Romans 12:21
verses.text: Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.
